REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f1858 reute r f BC-FRENCH-AID-TO-TOGO-TO 06-01 0046

TEXT.TITLE: FRENCH AID TO TOGO TO HELP COFFEE, COCOA TREES
TEXT.BODY: France is to provide Togo with 475 mln cfa francs of aid for a range of projects that include development of the coffee and cocoa industries and reafforestation in the south of the country, official sources said. Reuter
